document_data.mainbody:
Madalitso was a human patron of the Blushing Mermaid in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Madalitso, just like his daughter, Nafula, had a dark bronze skin color. He had short curly black hair and dark brown eyes.
In the , during the time Captain Grisly was replaced by the green hag Auntie Ethel as the owner of the Blushing Mermaid, Madalitso and Nafula could often be found in the taverns second-floor taproom. At that time, Madalitso was trying to convince Nafula to marry someone for the familys financial well-being, yet Nafula was opposed to an arranged marriage without love. However, for the familys sake and with some convincing, she was open to at least meeting the suitor before turning him down completely.
